thread.title: Chinese activist-artist Ai Weiwei writing memoir
thread.title_full: Chinese activist-artist Ai Weiwei writing memoir

title: Chinese activist-artist Ai Weiwei writing memoir
text:
> Entertainment Chinese activist-artist Ai Weiwei writing memoir FILE - In this Sept. 15, 2015 file photo, Chinese artist Ai Weiwei poses for photographers with one of his pieces at his exhibition at the Royal Academy of Arts in London. Ai is working on a currently untitled memoir. The Penguin Random House division Crown announced Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, that it would release the book in the spring of 2017. (AP Photo/Frank Augstein, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
